NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Shelvin Mack epitomizes why Butler should not be considered any kind of cuddly underdog. The 6-foot-3, 215-pound Mack is Butler’s answer to the transcendent Connecticut star Kemba Walker.
snippet: Shelvin Mack epitomizes why Butler should not be considered any kind of cuddly underdog. The 6-foot-3, 215-pound Mack is Butler’s answer to the transcendent Connecticut star Kemba Walker.
